rooms.description: A welcoming open space that doubles as a transitional area leading into the home. Designed with Vastu principles in mind for positive energy flow.
Spacious living and dining area with natural light coming from a large West-facing window. The arrangement follows Vastu guidelines to promote prosperity.
Modern kitchen placed in the North-East quadrant for enhanced energy and auspicious activities according to Vastu. Equipped with ample storage space.
A comfortable guest room located in the West section of the ground floor for privacy and ease of access to common areas.
Primary bedroom placed in the North-West quadrant for balance between rest and activity. Designed with extra space and adjoining closet.
Modern bathroom designed with privacy and comfort. Placed strategically near master bedroom as per Vastu norms.
Additional space for storage or small utilities, aligned with local building requirements.

openings.description: Large double door entrance to welcome positive energy and enhance the flow of natural light.
Provides transitional space from outdoors to indoors while adhering to Vastu by allowing sunlight at early morning hours.
Large window with a view of the garden, aligns with Vastu principles for wealth and success.
Dual door opening leading to the two-car garage at the side of the cottage.

rooms.description: Expansive master suite with en-suite bathroom and balcony for private relaxation. Placed in the North-East zone to maximize Vastu benefits.
Additional bedroom designed for family members with ample closet space and natural lighting.
Compact bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort in line with traditional Vastu alignments.
Dedicated study or home office placed in the North-West quadrant to encourage concentration and productivity.
Open terrace providing panoramic view of the garden and sky, ideal for morning yoga and relaxation.

openings.description: Stairwell connecting ground and first floor, designed to ensure smooth circulation of energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed windows for ample natural light in bedrooms and study area, ensuring good ventilation.

garden.description: A large garden surrounding the cottage with areas designated for relaxation, gardening, and outdoor activities. Planted in a manner that enhances the overall Vastu energy of the property.

garage.description: Spacious two-car garage placed on the South-West side to maintain proper balance as per Vastu guidelines and local building norms.
